videos.description: LSU's Tremont Waters inbounds to Emmitt Williams, who rushes into the post and slams.
videos.headline: Williams throws down on inbounds pass

videos.description: Auburn head coach Bruce Pearl is not happy after he is called for a second coach's box violation against LSU.
videos.headline: Pearl gets heated after 2nd coach's box violation

videos.description: Javonte Smart steals the ball at midcourt then passes it to Naz Reid, who slams home the turnaround dunk with one hand.
videos.headline: Reid slams one-handed turnaround dunk
